author: Holly Secon
title: Almost half of all Americans have been ordered to stay at home. This map shows which cities and states are under lockdown.
description: 22 states have issued stay-at-home orders, encouraging isolation measures to prevent the spread of the coronavirus. Other metro areas, such as Anchorage, Alaska; Philadelphia, Pennsylvania; and Houston and Dallas, Texas; are also under stay-at-home orders. In…
content:
As of Thursday, 22 US states have issued stay-at-home orders, asking residents to leave their homes only for essential services such as buying food and medicine.
The goal is to minimize how often people come within 6 feet of one another, thereby reducing the… [+2045 chars]
